SURYAA KRISHNAN
ksuryaa7@gmail.com   |   480 330 3051   |   Phoenix, AZ 85027 
                                    Summary  
•  Currently working as a Senior Associate with overall 8.11 years of experience in India's leading IT solutions provider, 
Atos Syntel in developing applications and supporting maintenance projects in Mainframe technology.
•  Good experience in COBOL, DB2, and JCL programming. Worked in CA7 scheduler, Endevor, and Changeman 
tools.
•  Worked in Microfocus environment. Knows CICS and IMS environment.
•  Working knowledge in salesforce development.
•  Good knowledge of analyzing COBOL programming and other debugging techniques.
•  Worked on Production support issues and delivered within SLA.
•  Hands-on experience with IBM tools like File Manager, and Xpediter IBM debugging tool (both online and batch).
•  Worked on Banking projects (Finance and payments), Card processing, and Retail projects.

•  Worked on Banking projects (Finance and payments), Card processing, and Retail projects.
•  Having knowledge and very good experience in Service Management processes like Incident Management, 
Problem Management, and Change Management as per ITIL standards using tools like Service Now, and Jira.
•  Having Expertise in Credit card Acquisition Systems and Banking Systems Involved in production support activities 
in different shifts for actively monitoring the batch run during nights and weekends.
•  Providing solutions to customers and working efficiently to resolve them within the SLAs.
•  Working as a developer by performing the Permanent resolution for the problem records created by the Support 
team.

based on historic information and presenting them to lead to pursue further.

as Genesis is an International payable system which is one of the most critical Account payable systems of
